      Classes in org.ensor.robots.scheduler with type parameters of type Biote 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BioteModule<T extends Biote>
      The Biote module class provides the capability to add functionality to a particular Biote without the Biote itself being aware that it carries this functionality.
      Methods in org.ensor.robots.scheduler that return Biote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Biote BioteModule.getBiote()
      This method returns the Biote that this module is connected to.
